Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Hillary Clinton and her campaign did not start the birther controversy.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that Hillary Clinton and her campaign started the birther controversy.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Hillary Clinton and her campaign were involved in the origins of the birther movement without any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that some diehard Clinton supporters pushed the birther theory during the 2008 campaign, but there is no evidence implicating Clinton or her campaign in it.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Donald Trump "finished" the birther controversy when it was already settled before he got involved.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating biases in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by making false statements about Hillary Clinton and her campaign's involvement in the birther controversy.
